original_text: Because you had so many things to sell, traders came to you from Syria. They paid you with different jewels, with valuable purple cloth, with other beautiful cloth and with good linen. Because you had so many things to sell, traders came to you from Syria. They paid you with different jewels, with valuable purple cloth, with other beautiful cloth and with good linen.
korean_text: 너의 제품이 풍부하므로 아람은 너와 거래하였음이여 남보석과 자색 베와 수 놓은 것과 가는 베와 산호와 홍보석을 네 물품과 바꾸어 갔도다

sentences.original_text: Because you had so many things to sell
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 팔 물건이 너무 많았기 때문에

sentences.original_text: traders came to you from Syria
They paid you with different jewels
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 여러 보석으로 너에게 값을 지불했다
